messages.content: You have completed two industrial training internships. The first was with Insys Technologies in Mumbai, MH, from Aug 2021 – Sept 2021, where you acquired practical knowledge and skills in ethical hacking techniques, gained hands-on experience in networking, and worked effectively in a team environment to identify and address cybersecurity issues. The second was with DISRUPTIVENEXT (PHOENIXGEN SYSTEMS) in Mumbai, MH, from June 2024 – Dec 2024, where you developed Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems using Langflow and n8n to automate metadata extraction, data embedding, and query-response workflows; created Python scripts for web scraping, data preprocessing, and integration of OpenAI embeddings with Supabase and Cohere vector stores, optimizing data pipelines and enabling scalable solutions; leveraged Generative AI and LLM technologies (e.g., OpenAI) for advanced metadata extraction, content analysis, and dynamic query response systems; and built multi-agent workflows for metadata validation, data enrichment, and error handling, enhancing workflow efficiency and system performance at scale.
